item.text: Once more I looked, and this time I saw four chariots emerging from between two mountains of bronze.

Harnessed to the <st data-num="07223" class="">first</st> <st data-num="04818" class="">chariot</st> were <st data-num="0122" class="">red</st> <st data-num="05483" class="">horses</st>, to the <st data-num="04818 08145">second</st> <st data-num="07838" class="">black</st> <st data-num="05483" class="">horses</st>,

to the <st data-num="04818 07992">third</st> <st data-num="03836" class="">white</st> <st data-num="05483" class="">horses</st>, and to the <st data-num="04818 07243">fourth</st> <st data-num="01261" class="">spotted</st> <st data-num="05483" class="">horses</st>, all of them <st data-num="0554" class="">strong</st>.<n id="1" />

Then I <st data-num="06030 0559 0413">asked</st> the <st data-num="04397" class="">angelic messenger</st><n id="1" /> who was <st data-num="01696" class="">speaking</st> with me, “<st data-num="04100" class="">What</st> are <st data-num="0428" class="">these</st>, <st data-num="0113" class="">sir</st>?”

The <st data-num="04397" class="">messenger</st> <st data-num="06030 0559 0413">replied</st>, “<st data-num="0428" class="">These</st> are the <st data-num="0702" class="">four</st> <st data-num="07307" class="">spirits</st><n id="1" /> of <st data-num="08064" class="">heaven</st> <st data-num="03318" class="">going out</st> after <st data-num="03320" class="">presenting</st> themselves <st data-num="05921" class="">before</st> the <st data-num="0113" class="">Lord</st> of <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="0776" class="">earth</st>.

<st data-num="0834" class="">The chariot</st> with the <st data-num="07838" class="">black</st> <st data-num="05483" class="">horses</st> is <st data-num="03318" class="">going</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="06828" class="">north</st> <st data-num="0776" class="">country</st>, and the <st data-num="03836" class="">white ones</st> are <st data-num="03318" class="">going</st> <st data-num="0413 0310">after</st> them, but the <st data-num="01261" class="">spotted ones</st> are <st data-num="03318" class="">going</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="08486" class="">south</st> <st data-num="0776" class="">country</st>.

All these <st data-num="0554" class="">strong ones</st><n id="1" /> are <st data-num="03318" class="">scattering</st>; they have <st data-num="01245" class="">sought</st> permission to <st data-num="01980" class="">go</st> and <st data-num="01980" class="">walk about</st> over the <st data-num="0776" class="">earth</st>.” The Lord had <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st>, “<st data-num="01980" class="">Go</st>! <st data-num="01980" class="">Walk about</st> over the <st data-num="0776" class="">earth</st>!” So they are <st data-num="01980 0776">doing so</st>.
Then he cried out to me, “Look! The ones going to the northland have brought me peace about the northland.”
The Lord’s message came to me as follows:

“<st data-num="03947" class="">Choose</st> some people<n id="1" /> <st data-num="0854" class="">from</st> among the <st data-num="01473" class="">exiles</st>, namely, <st data-num="02469" class="">Heldai</st>, <st data-num="02900" class="">Tobijah</st>, and <st data-num="03048" class="">Jedaiah</st>, all <st data-num="0834" class="">who</st> have <st data-num="0935" class="">come</st> from <st data-num="0894" class="">Babylon</st>, and <st data-num="03117 01931">when</st> <st data-num="0859" class="">you</st> have done so <st data-num="0935 0935">go</st> to the <st data-num="01004" class="">house</st> of <st data-num="02977" class="">Josiah</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> of <st data-num="06846" class="">Zephaniah</st>.<n id="2" />

Then <st data-num="03947" class="">take</st> some <st data-num="03701" class="">silver</st> and <st data-num="02091" class="">gold</st> to <st data-num="06213" class="">make</st> a <st data-num="05850" class="">crown</st><n id="1" /> and <st data-num="07760" class="">set</st> it on the <st data-num="07218" class="">head</st> of <st data-num="03091" class="">Joshua</st> the <st data-num="01419" class="">high</st> <st data-num="03548" class="">priest, the</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> of <st data-num="03087" class="">Jehozadak</st>.
Then say to him, ‘The Lord of Heaven’s Armies says, “Look—here is the man whose name is Branch, who will sprout up from his place and build the temple of the Lord.

Indeed, he will build the temple of the Lord, and he will be clothed in splendor, sitting as king on his throne. Moreover, there will be a priest with him on his throne and they will see eye to eye on everything.
The crown will then be turned over to Helem, Tobijah, Jedaiah, and Hen son of Zephaniah as a memorial in the temple of the Lord.

Then those who are far away will come and build the temple of the Lord so that you may know that the Lord of Heaven’s Armies has sent me to you. This will all come to pass if you completely obey the voice of the Lord your God.”’”
